Name: IfCondition
Description: The condition which must be met to trigger the Then clause, expressed as a CommandCode. The condition is an expression in the programming language used in the instrument.

Name: ThenConstructReference
Description: Reference to the control construct which should be triggered if the associated condition is met.

Name: ElseIf
Description: Use for multiple branching from a single point in the flow logic represented by the flow logic If, Then, ElseIf, Then, etc.

Name: ElseConstructReference
Description: Reference to the control construct which is triggered if the associated condition is not met.
